description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Brutes and may be slotted into any Brute damage power.

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Brutes and may be slotted into any Brute damage power.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy, Damage and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% .  This enhancement can only be slotted by Brutes and may be slotted into any Brute damage power.

description.short: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost, and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Brutes and may be slotted into any Brute damage power.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy and Damage, Increases Attack Rate, and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Brutes and may be slotted into any Brute damage power.

description.short: Increases Attack Rate and has a chance to grant extra Fury
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives this power a chance to grant 5 Fury to the Brute and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Brutes and may be slotted into any Brute damage power.
